item.title: [PI] Dicing,Frost drags,Gamble zone, New D zone
item.dc:creator: @ShAuNyShAuN ShAuNyShAuN
item.description:
@ShAuNyShAuN wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:67, topic:424026”][quote author=ShAuNyShAuN link=topic=526676.msg3845201#msg3845201 date=1323561129]

I change the ip’s in client.java but it still doesnt let me log in.
It says, No response from server :S? and ideas?

change the ip in the gui too, and if your connecting to your own server keep the ips on 127.0.0.1

Still saying it :’(, which is disappointing because this looked really nice
[/quote]
are you connect to a server that you are running? or someone else’s[/quote]

I’m trying to connect to my hamachi one, but even if i use 127.0.0.1 it still says
“no response from server, please try a different world”

do i change every 127.0.0.1 in client and gui.java or just server = ?

Read full topic

item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Impactz, post:60, topic:424026”]When i run the server it opens and closes…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVerstionError: server/Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
(at java.lang.Classloading etc…)
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.

[size=52pt]PLEASE HELP[/size][/quote]
get the newest version of java and java jdk and delete the old ones

item.title: [PI] Dicing,Frost drags,Gamble zone, New D zone
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“darkpurex, post:53, topic:424026”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=526676.msg3841266#msg3841266 date=1323261597]

[quote author=darkpurex link=topic=526676.msg3840431#msg3840431 date=1323192704]

and where will i find my loginmethod?
[/quote]Where you find everything, client.java

globe[0].drawSprite(10, 123);
} else if(is525 == true || is562 == true) {
drawGlobe();
if (globeState[0] && globeState[1]) {
globe[2].drawSprite(10, 123);
} else if (globeState[1]) {
globe[2].drawSprite(10, 123);
} else if (globeState[0]) {
globe[1].drawSprite(10, 123);
} else {

			globe[1].drawSprite(10, 123);
		}

i found this do i need to removee the 123’s or isn’t this it?
[/quote]No, the client.java of your server

what to delete in there? i cant find anything with packet123.[/quote]Don’t look for “packet123” look for outstream.sendframe shit

Read full topic

I’ve changed almost everything except the Stuff in the quest tab and when you log in there’s a notification how do you change that?

if your talking about the login message when you log into the server then look at announcements where the run server.bat is
